channel.title: Quotes on Creased Paperbacks
channel.description: Recent content in Quotes on Creased Paperbacks

item.title: Quotes
item.description: This section is for quotes from books I read but didn’t review, or quotes I found particularly meaningful. Wisdom Almost everything will work again if you unplug it for a few minutes, including you. — Anne Lamott. “Almost Everything”. The part I like most about Luke’s story is the lawyer who tries to trap Jesus with a trick question about who his neighbor is, so he can find a loophole in Jesus’ appeal to love thy neighbor.
